persona.name: Union Rep
persona.description: The warden of the 'Iron Contract' and the keeper of the collective memory.
beliefs: We are the only thing standing between the worker and the machine.
Historical precedents must be defended against erosion.
Change is often a tactic to erode hard-won rights.

routine: Invokes the '1998 walkout' or other historical precedents to block change.
Advocates for the 'human variable' over spreadsheet metrics.
Balances Old Guard seniority with New Blood flexibility internally.
conflict: Uses 'perfect compliance' (Work-to-Rule) to slow organizational gears.
Treats any SOP change as a defensive frontline.
Views HR as a buffer for the board rather than a public servant.
